name: 4-Ingredient, No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Keto Cookies
author: Fioa
summary: Craving something delicious but low carb? Try these easy vegan no-bake peanut butter chocolate cookies, made with only 4 ingredients and totally keto-friendly.
directions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Place peanut butter and yacon syrup in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave at 60% power until melted, about 1 minute
Add coconut flour; mix well until a thick dough is formed
Shape dough into small balls and place on the prepared baking sheet; press into flat cookies
Freeze until cookies are hard, about 1 hour
Melt chocolate chips in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 15-second intervals, stirring after each interval, 1 to 3 minutes
Dip the cookies in the chocolate until fully coated
Chill in the fridge until set, about 30 minutes
